1.Title: Standard Blocking Technique
1.Description: While Shielded, the equipper's Energy Regen increases by <color=#2BAD00>0.4</color>/s. The Anomaly Buildup of <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Ups</color> increase by <color=#2BAD00>36%</color>.
